title: ISic001679. I.Sicily inscription 001679
body:
1Δι̣ὶ̣ ὁ δᾶμ[ος τῶν Ἐγεσταίων]
2Ἡράκλειον Νύμφωνος Πε̣[---]
3ἀρετᾶς ἕνεκα

1Δ..ΟΔΑΜ[..............]
2ΗΡΑΚΛΕΙΟΝΝΥΜΦΩΝΟΣΠ.[---]
3ΑΡΕΤΑΣΕΝΕΚΑ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of I.Segesta

English translation

Jonathan Prag

To Zeus. The people of the Segestans (have dedicated this statue of) Herakleios Pe[---] son of Nymphon, on account of his excellence

Italian translation

A Zeus. Il popolo dei Segestani (ha onorator/ha eretto la statua di) Herakleios, figlio di Nymphon, Pe[---], per il suo valore [transl. from I.Segesta]

commentary

bibliography

    Ampolo and Erdas 2019 G3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001036
    De Cesare, Parra 2001 418 with n.6 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002470 Ampolo et al 2010 523 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002469
